column1: Local Foods////My favorite sandwich place. The crunchy chicken sandwich and truffle egg sandwich tasted so fresh
column2: probably the freshest based in the dozens of times we have eaten here. The best thing
column3: they finally brought back the original grapefruit mintade. They changed it to watermelon mintade for a year or so and although we liked it
column4: the grapefruit is the best. The chips were also super fresh as well. If only they bring back the cabbage slaw from years back although we did enjoy the kale side as well. Great lunch as always.
